#labels Phase-Deploy
 http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3655/3672298911_2d15010106_o.png 

= Steps =

  # Download the latest [http://code.google.com/p/quicksynergy/downloads/list .dmg package]
  # Mount the .dmg package as a Volume on Finder
  # Drag QuickSynergy to the Applications folder
  # Eject the QuickSynergy Volume on Finder
